    • reserveTable

      public String reserveTable(String[] details)
      1) input from RestaurantController when add new reservation
      Parameters:
      details - [3]: cust_id, res_datetime, pax
      details - [5]: cust_id, res_datetime, pax, table_id, res_id
      Returns:
      res_id if allocated succesfully, "false" other 2) input from TableController's constructor for initialize the memory
